about_the_game:
Story:

George is a responsible executive, a career man, and a wonderful father. Except that his favorite daughter, Ruby, a hot and wayward college student, constantly annoys her daddy with her wild lifestyle and endless affairs with different men. One day, Ruby brags to her father that she has found a decent job at her college. George is overcome by vague doubts that lead him to a webcam platform. After being exposed, little Ruby shows a new side: lecherous and lustful.

Key Features:

Deep Narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool Soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains incest. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Incest Tales: Webcam Daughter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Incest Tales: Webcam Daughter is a visual novel for adults. The father of a young girl named Ruby discovers one day that his daughter makes a living by webcasting. This discovery ignites a passion between the father and his daughter.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
